section.name: Import Element
section.p: The <import> element declares the import of of another index or module definition.

subsection.name: Import Attributes
subsection.p: The import element may be declared using one of the following attribute. An import via uri is used to import a module file. An import using the index attribute imports another local index file.

tr.td: A uri of a module to be imported into the index. The uri value is a Transit artifact urn or link urn. <import uri="artifact:module:dpml/metro/dpml-metro#3000"> Import values may also be declared as Ant property symbols. <import uri="${module.uri}">
Import another index into this index. The value of attribute if a filename resolved relative to the containing index. <import index="../examples/index.xml">
